data.title: New York Knicks Roster
data.meta_description: New York Knicks scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Shandon Anderson was acquired in a sign and trade by the New York Knicks from the Houston Rockets on August 10, 2001.

Penny Hardaway was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Phoenix Suns on January 5, 2004.

Othella Harrington was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Vancouver Grizzlies on January 30, 2001.

Stephon Marbury was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Phoenix Suns on January 5, 2004.

Nazr Mohammed was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Atlanta Hawks on February 15, 2004.

Moochie Norris was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Houston Rockets on December 30, 2003.

Tim Thomas was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Milwaukee Bucks on February 15, 2004.

Cezary Trybanski was acquired in a trade by the New York Knicks from the Phoenix Suns on January 5, 2004.

Vin Baker signed a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on March 12, 2004.

Allan Houston signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks on July 14, 1996. Allan Houston re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on July 20, 2001.

DerMarr Johnson signed a contract with the New York Knicks on February 3, 2004. DerMarr Johnson re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on February 13, 2004.

Dikembe Mutombo signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on October 9, 2003.

Kurt Thomas signed a multi-year contract with the New York Knicks on January 22, 1999. Kurt Thomas re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on August 1, 2000. Kurt Thomas re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the New York Knicks on March 9, 2004.
